zh-cn: 小杰拉尔德·鲁道夫·福特

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，曾任美国第40任副总统和第38任总统。他是美国历史上唯一一位未经选举就接任副总统以及总统的人。二战期间在美国海军服役，退役后进入政界。其上任后特赦尼克松的决定引来广泛批评，被认为是其1976年大选失利的主要原因之一。
description.en: An American politician who served as the 38th President and 40th Vice President of the United States. He is the only person to have served as both vice president and president without being elected to either office. He served in the U.S. Navy during World War II before entering politics. His decision to pardon Richard Nixon was highly controversial and is considered a major reason for his defeat in the 1976 presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 美国第37任总统，因水门事件而辞职。他任命杰拉尔德·福特为副总统，后被福特特赦。
description.en: The 37th President of the United States, who resigned from office due to the Watergate scandal. He appointed Gerald Ford as Vice President and was later pardoned by him.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，曾任乔治亚州州长，后于1976年美国总统选举中击败杰拉尔德·福特，成为第39任美国总统。
description.en: An American politician who served as the governor of Georgia and later defeated Gerald Ford in the 1976 presidential election to become the 39th President of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，曾任纽约州州长，后被杰拉尔德·福特提名为副总统，成为美国第41任副总统。
description.en: An American politician who served as Governor of New York and was nominated by Gerald Ford to become the 41st Vice President of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 杰拉尔德·福特的妻子，美国第一夫人。她以对社会议题的坦率言论而闻名，并创办了贝蒂·福特中心以帮助治疗药物滥用问题。
description.en: Wife of Gerald Ford and First Lady of the United States. She was known for her candidness on social issues and founded the Betty Ford Center for substance abuse treatment.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，演员出身，曾任加利福尼亚州州长。他在1976年共和党总统初选中挑战杰拉尔德·福特，后于1980年当选为第40任美国总统。
description.en: An American politician and actor who served as Governor of California. He challenged Gerald Ford for the Republican presidential nomination in 1976 and was later elected as the 40th President of the United States in 1980.

description.zh-cn: 美国外交家和政治理论家，曾在理查德·尼克松和杰拉尔德·福特总统任内担任美国国务卿。
description.en: An American diplomat and political theorist who served as United States Secretary of State under presidents Richard Nixon and Gerald Ford.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，在杰拉尔德·福特总统任内曾被任命为驻中华人民共和国联络处主任和中央情报局局长。他后来成为第41任美国总统。
description.en: An American politician who was appointed by President Gerald Ford as Chief of the U.S. Liaison Office in the People's Republic of China and later as Director of Central Intelligence. He later became the 41st President of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，在杰拉尔德·福特总统任内担任白宫办公厅主任。他后来成为第46任美国副总统。
description.en: An American politician who served as White House Chief of Staff under President Gerald Ford. He later became the 46th Vice President of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，曾任堪萨斯州联邦参议员。在1976年美国总统选举中，被杰拉尔德·福特选为副总统候选人。
description.en: An American politician who served as a U.S. Senator from Kansas. He was selected by Gerald Ford as his vice presidential running mate in the 1976 presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 美国第36任总统。他任命杰拉尔德·福特为调查肯尼迪遇刺案的沃伦委员会成员。
description.en: The 36th President of the United States. He appointed Gerald Ford as a member of the Warren Commission to investigate the assassination of President Kennedy.

description.zh-cn: 美国第42任总统。1999年，他授予杰拉尔德·福特总统自由勋章。
description.en: The 42nd President of the United States. In 1999, he awarded Gerald Ford the Presidential Medal of Freedom.

description.zh-cn: 20世纪70年代美国的一场重大政治丑闻，最终导致理查德·尼克松总统辞职，并为杰拉尔德·福特接任总统铺平了道路。
description.en: A major political scandal in the United States in the 1970s that resulted in the resignation of President Richard Nixon and paved the way for Gerald Ford's presidency.

description.zh-cn: 越南战争末期，美军从南越首都西贡撤离美国公民及相关越南人的军事行动，该行动在杰拉尔德·福特总统任内执行。
description.en: The military operation at the end of the Vietnam War to evacuate American civilians and at-risk Vietnamese from Saigon, the capital of South Vietnam, conducted during the presidency of Gerald Ford.

description.zh-cn: 一项由35个国家（包括美国和苏联）签署的协议，旨在改善冷战期间东西方之间的关系。杰拉尔德·福特代表美国签署了该协议。
description.en: An agreement signed by 35 nations, including the USA and USSR, in an attempt to improve relations between the East and the West during the Cold War. Gerald Ford signed it on behalf of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 美国第48届总统选举，民主党候选人吉米·卡特击败了寻求连任的共和党现任总统杰拉尔德·福特。
description.en: The 48th U.S. presidential election, in which Democratic candidate Jimmy Carter defeated incumbent Republican President Gerald Ford.

nodes.id: 福特总统在萨克拉门托遇刺案

zh-cn: 福特总统在萨克拉门托遇刺案
en: Gerald Ford assassination attempt in Sacramento

description.zh-cn: 曼森家族追随者Lynette 'Squeaky' Fromme在加州萨克拉门托试图刺杀美国总统杰拉尔德·福特的事件。
description.en: An assassination attempt on U.S. President Gerald Ford in Sacramento, California by Manson Family follower Lynette 'Squeaky' Fromme.

description.zh-cn: 美利坚合众国的国家元首和政府首脑。
description.en: The head of state and head of government of the United States of America.

en: Vice President of the United States

description.zh-cn: 美利坚合众国联邦政府中级别第二高的官员。
description.en: The second-highest officer in the executive branch of the U.S. federal government.

description.zh-cn: 美国国会的两院之一。
description.en: One of the two chambers of the United States Congress.

description.zh-cn: 由美国总统林登·约翰逊设立，旨在调查约翰·肯尼迪总统遇刺案的委员会。
description.en: A commission established by U.S. President Lyndon B. Johnson to investigate the assassination of President John F. Kennedy.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国密歇根州的公立研究型大学，是杰拉尔德·福特的母校之一。
description.en: A public research university in Michigan, United States, and one of Gerald Ford's alma maters.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国康涅狄格州的私立常春藤联盟研究型大学，杰拉尔德·福特在此获得法学学位。
description.en: A private Ivy League research university in Connecticut, United States, where Gerald Ford earned his law degree.

description.zh-cn: 美国武装力量的海上作战分支。杰拉尔德·福特曾在第二次世界大战期间在此服役。
description.en: The naval warfare service branch of the United States Armed Forces. Gerald Ford served in it during World War II.

position.en: Vice President of the United States

description.zh-cn: 在斯皮罗·阿格纽辞职后，杰拉尔德·福特被理查德·尼克松任命为副总统。
description.en: After the resignation of Spiro Agnew, Gerald Ford was appointed Vice President by Richard Nixon.

description.zh-cn: 理查德·尼克松因水门事件辞职，杰拉尔德·福特继任总统职位。
description.en: Richard Nixon resigned due to the Watergate scandal, and Gerald Ford succeeded him as President.

description.zh-cn: 无条件和完全赦免尼克松在他担任总统期间所犯下的或可能犯下的任何罪行。
description.en: Granted a full and unconditional pardon to Richard Nixon for any crimes he might have committed against the United States while president.

description.zh-cn: 水门事件导致副总统斯皮罗·阿格纽辞职，并最终导致尼克松总统辞职，为福特先后接任副总统和总统创造了条件。
description.en: The Watergate scandal led to the resignation of Vice President Spiro Agnew and eventually President Nixon, creating the circumstances for Ford to become Vice President and then President.

position.en: 40th Vice President of the United States

position.zh-cn: 密歇根州第5国会选区众议员
position.en: U.S. Representative for Michigan's 5th congressional district
Vice President of the United States

description.zh-cn: 杰拉尔德·福特提名前纽约州长纳尔逊·洛克菲勒出任副总统。
description.en: Gerald Ford nominated former New York Governor Nelson Rockefeller to serve as Vice President.

description.zh-cn: 在1976年美国总统选举中击败福特，使其未能连任。
description.en: Defeated Ford in the 1976 United States presidential election, preventing his re-election.

description.zh-cn: 福特执政期间，美军执行常风行动从越南西贡撤离美国公民及相关人员。
description.en: During Ford's presidency, the U.S. military executed Operation Frequent Wind to evacuate American civilians and at-risk personnel from Saigon, Vietnam.

description.zh-cn: 代表美国与苏联等国签署赫尔辛基协议，旨在缓和冷战关系。
description.en: Signed the Helsinki Accords on behalf of the United States, aiming to de-escalate Cold War tensions.

description.zh-cn: 任命福特为研究肯尼迪总统遇刺案的沃伦委员会成员。
description.en: Appointed Ford to the Warren Commission to investigate the assassination of President John F. Kennedy.

description.zh-cn: 先后任命乔治·赫伯特·沃克·布什为驻中华人民共和国联络处主任（1974年）和中央情报局局长（1975年）。
description.en: Appointed George H. W. Bush as Chief of the U.S. Liaison Office in the People's Republic of China (1974) and later as Director of Central Intelligence (1975).

description.zh-cn: 在加州萨克拉门托遭遇未遂刺杀。
description.en: Survived an assassination attempt in Sacramento, California.

description.zh-cn: 在1976年共和党总统初选中挑战福特，寻求总统候选人提名。
description.en: Challenged Ford for the Republican presidential nomination in the 1976 primaries.

description.zh-cn: 选择鲍勃·多尔作为其1976年总统竞选的副总统候选人。
description.en: Selected Bob Dole as his vice presidential running mate for the 1976 presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 授予福特总统自由勋章。
description.en: Awarded Ford the Presidential Medal of Freedom.
